title: Demis Hassabis: AI as a Catalyst for Revolutionary Scientific Discovery
description: Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis emphasizes AI as a transformative technology at the India AI Summit. He outlines the potential of AI, especially Artificial General Intelligence, in accelerating scientific discoveries and improving human life. Hassabis advocates for a scientific approach to harness AI's full capacity safely and effectively.

title: Google, Shopee-owner Sea to develop AI tools for e-commerce, gaming
description: Alphabet Inc's Google and Southeast Asian technology conglomerate Sea Ltd announced a new tie-up on Thursday that will develop artificial intelligence tools for Sea's e-commerce and gaming products.
content:
Under the newly-signed strategic partnership, the two companies will jointly "explore the building of an AI agentic shopping prototype" on Sea's e-commerce platform Shopee, they said in a statement.

title: ‘MANAV Is India’s AI Model for the World’: PM Modi Unveils India’s Human-Centric & Accountable AI Doctrine At AI Impact Summit

title: France to welcome 30,000 Indian students by 2030, says Macron
description: Artificial Intelligence must serve humanity with strong protections for children, transparency in algorithms to address bias, and a firm commitment to preserving linguistic and cultural diversity, said French President Emmanuel Macron
content:
In a major step toward boosting academic mobility between India and France, Emmanuel Macron on February 19 reaffirmed France’s goal of hosting 30,000 Indian students by 2030.

title: Google and Sea Ltd Collaborate to Revolutionize AI in E-commerce and Gaming
description: Alphabet Inc's Google and Sea Ltd have announced a collaboration to develop artificial intelligence tools for e-commerce and gaming. The partnership will explore creating an AI shopping prototype on Sea's Shopee platform, aiming to enhance productivity and capabilities in revenue generation for the tech industry.
content:
